thread.title: The Weeknd Releases Virtual Reality Video for 'The Hills (Remix)' Ft. Eminem
thread.title_full: The Weeknd Releases Virtual Reality Video for 'The Hills (Remix)' Ft. Eminem

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: The Weeknd Releases Virtual Reality Video for 'The Hills (Remix)' Ft. Eminem
text:
Comments The 360-degree clip was made by the singer in collaboration with Apple Music, GoPro and director Nabil. 
As he continues to rule the Billboard Hot 100 chart with "The Hills", The Weeknd has released a music video for the hit's remix featuring Eminem . Arriving on Tuesday, October 20, the clip was created by the R&B singer in collaboration with Apple Music, GoPro and director Nabil. The interactive visuals allows fans to move the camera 360 degrees to see what's happening in The Weeknd's surroundings as he walks out of the club and makes his way to his limo while a car explodes not so far from him. Viewers must use Google Chrome or the YouTube app on mobile to fully experience the video. "The Hills (Remix)" with Eminem came out earlier this month along with another version featuring Nicki Minaj . The original, which appears on The Weeknd's " Beauty Behind the Madness " album, is currently spending its fifth week at No. 1 on the Hot 100. Right before the track started dominating the chart, the 25-year-old crooner topped the list with his other hit "Can't Feel My Face".
